 2008-06712008-04-10,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of JOHN M. BADOWSKI of Ancaster, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective April 21, 2008.
